name: frenzy-plant
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.x-y: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.
